issue.title: [C++] Status::WithMessage should accept variadic parameters
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6535](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6535). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently only the Status factories like `Status::Invalid` accept variadic ostreamable parameters, but `Status::WithMessage` would also benefit from this pattern (and potentially other methods of Status or Result)
